metadata.title: CVE-2025-0244 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - negligible
metadata.description: When redirecting to an invalid protocol scheme, an attacker could spoof theaddress bar.*Note: This issue only affected Android operating systems. Other operatingsystems are unaffected.* This vulnerability affects Firefox < 134.

criterions.comment: mozjs102: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
mozjs115: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
